title: Congress abolishes the child tax exemption, the mortgage deduction, and the tax deduction.
subtitle: :: Has Congress abolished the child tax exemption, income tax exemption and mortgage deduction due to the impact of the Coach industries?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The Congress has abolished the child tax exemption, the income tax exemption and the mortgage deduction from the Tax Code under pressure from pressure groups and the Coch brothers.
